text: Descendants of Harakhte. "Forbidden" is a word for fools
For the undead, consumption of the living is regenerative, it also provides bodies to fill the ranks fo the damned....
Plundering tombs and other burial places provides unique weapons, armour, and all sorts of valuable corpsley commodities.
Necromancers have released their hold of spirits en masse. They are now loose and spreading wanton violence.
The Tribunal of Night performs the abominable "Ritual of True Night" by calling upon the combined Lores of Vampires, Yin and Dark to spread a fog of darkness across the land.
The borders have opened for mortals to sell their wears, we must refrain from killing... too many of them if we want to maintain good relations.
The trees groan and a monstrosity of warped wood and fused bodies merges from the darkness. We command these desecrated woods for now...
